name: 'Toy Story 2': Who's Woody Talking To? Quiz | Movies | 20 Questions

questions.text: My hat is *not* under my boot.
questions.explanation:
Bo.

	He says this to Bo when she asks him to look under his boot. She really wanted to point out the 'ANDY' written there, to remind him that Andy really loves him.

Buster.

	Buster the dog had learned a trick from Woody, but still won't perform for Andy.

questions.text: I thought Mom took you to get your squeaker fixed months ago.
questions.explanation:
Wheezy.

	Woody's surprised to find Wheezy stuck on the back of the top shelf.

Jessie.

	This is in response to Jessie's joyous outburst of 'It's you! It's you! It's you!'

Stinky Pete.

	He angrily asks this when Stinky Pete patronizes him about his missing arm.

Jessie.

	He accuses her of turning on the TV to alert Al that he was trying to escape. He found the remote in front of her display case.

Jessie.

	Said when she tries to pick him up after falling off of Bullseye.

questions.text: No, (name omitted), I mean they're my friends!
questions.explanation:
Rex.

	When Woody's friends from Andy's room start fighting with the Roundup Gang, he says don't, because they're my friends. Rex says, 'Yeah, we're his friends,' to which Woody says the above phrase.

Buzz.

	He was trying to describe all of the merchandising that had been made based off of the 'Woody's Roundup' show. (Mr. Potato Head's remark to Hamm in response: ''Was'?'.)

questions.text: I wouldn't miss it for the world.
questions.explanation:
Stinky Pete.

	He referring to watching Andy growing up and eventually not playing with him anymore. He'd prefer this to being stuck in a museum for eternity.

Bullseye.

	Repeated phrase, ala 'Hiyo Silver, Away!'

Stinky Pete.

	Said when the prospector mangles Buzz's name.

questions.text: No one does that to my friend!
questions.explanation:
Stinky Pete.

	After Pete punches Buzz in the airport luggage conveyor room.

questions.text: I think it's time you learned the true meaning of 'play time'.
questions.explanation:
Stinky Pete.

	After they defeat Pete, Woody says this then puts him in Amy's Barbie backpack.

questions.text: I believe you're on the wrong flight.
questions.explanation:
Jessie.

	He playfully tells Jessie this after he comes to her rescue in the airplane's luggage compartment.

Buzz.

	He says this in preparation to performing a tricky lasso stunt with his pullstring.

Jessie, Buzz, Bullseye.

	Said to them just after they are flown over by a landing jet at the airport.

questions.text: Andy did a great job, eh? Nice and strong!
questions.explanation:
Bo.

	He's talking about the repair job Andy did on his re-injured arm. Andy put some extra stuffing in his arm, so it looks rather big.

Wheezy.

	He was asking about Wheezy's hoarse voice. Shark had found an extra squeaker for Wheezy, and now Wheezy can sing like Robert Goulet. 8-)

questions.text: Besides, when it all ends, I'll have old (name omitted) to keep me company, for infinity and beyond.
questions.explanation:
Buzz Lightyear.

	He says this to Buzz after Buzz asks him if he's worried about Andy's growing up.
